title: 1000 are Prime !
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the sum of  first 1000 prime numbers ?"}]}]}

17from math import sqrt
def is_prime(x):
    if x < 2:
        return False
    i = 2
    while i <= sqrt(x):
        if x % i == 0:
            return False
        i+=1
    return True
primes = set()
i = 2
while len(primes) < 1000:
    if is_prime(i):
        primes.add(i)
    i += 1
print "Answer:", sum(primes)


"}],"attrs":[{"text":"from math import sqrt
def is_prime(x):
    if x < 2:
        return False
    i = 2
    while i <= sqrt(x):
        if x % i == 0:
            return False
        i+=1
    return True
primes = set()
i = 2
while len(primes) < 1000:
    if is_prime(i):
        primes.add(i)
    i += 1
print "Answer:", sum(primes)
